fehd.ADR_EN: SUITE NO. 108-110 ON 1/F, TSIM SHA TSUI CENTRE, 66 MODY ROAD, TSIM SHA TSUI, KOWLOON
fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍尖沙咀麼地道66號尖沙咀中心1樓108-110店舖

geocode_en.formatted_address: 66, Shop 108, 110 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong

plus_code.compound_code: 75XH+22 Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: 66, Shop 108, 110 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 66, Shop 108, 110 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong
result.name: Ruth's Chris Steak House

plus_code.compound_code: 75XH+22 Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong

reviews.text: There was a piece of plastic in my soup. It was replaced after we told our waiter about it; she referred to the manager who offered another kind of soup. The steak came bare; no vegetables  to accompany it, considering the price you pay. The steak itself, meaning the meat was good. However, cooking it in butter all the way made it cloyingly greasy, the butter being soaked by the meat. I had great  expectations since I have been to HK many times and wanting to try this place.  I don't think I will be back.

It is getting worse! The food is ok, but the service is lousy. What happened to all the old staff? They were very good then. I think it comes down to management  - You lead from the top down. For what they charge, I would rather to Intercontinental next time. We won't be coming back, that's for sure.
High quality dining experience. Great service. Excellent steak. Definitely on the pricier side but everything was very good.

I’ve dined multiple times at 5 other Ruth’s Chris locations. They are a typically a reliable place for an excellent meal and service... this location (at 108-110, 66 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui Center, Hong Kong, 1830in the evening) was different.

The service was terrible for the price and quality of this chain. Worst Ruth’s Chris service I’ve ever experienced. We had to request a server and assistance for every portion of the dining experience. Nothing was offered, not drinks, appetizers, main course, the dessert of the check. No follow up, and no checking in except for one lone occasion well into the meal to finally ask if it was prepare to standard. The quickest turn around they managed all night was getting the check paid.

I will never recommend this particular branch of the Ruth’s Chris restaurant. Very poor service, and not worthy of the quality of the meal.

Disappointing to say the least.
Quality food and service.
